content: is there such a thing as  PS plugin: make triptych consistent \"look\"?

There isn't a specific Photoshop plugin called "make triptych consistent look," but there are various plugins and tools available in Photoshop that can help you achieve a consistent look across multiple images for a triptych. Plugins like Nik Collection, Topaz Labs, or Adobe Camera Raw can be used to apply consistent color grading, tones, or other effects to your images within Photoshop. Additionally, using adjustment layers, layer styles, and layer masks in Photoshop can also help you create a consistent look for your triptych.
